EmailTemplate.subject: The new Property VOI portal is live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We've just launched a new portal to make it easier to use our Property VOI services. With a single login, you can access all of our features in one place:
Access your VOI reports Generate the latest forms (both reusable and client-specific) Access our do-it-yourself VOI tool
To access the new portal Bookmark the Property VOI portal at https://auspost.com.au/propertyvoi for future reference. Your login details will remain the same.
Benefits of our Property VOI
Witnessing of Client Authorisation Forms / Land Registry Instruments presented during the VOI – included in your VOI reports Convenient options – VOI at more than 1,500 participating Post Offices across Australia or conducted by you (using our do-it-yourself VOI tool) Electronic report delivery – typically within 15 minutes Your VOI reports all in one place – whether identity checks are completed at a Post Office or by you Professional indemnity and fidelity insurance (with our in-store service)
Questions? Email us at LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au or call us on 1300 364 543.
Kind regards,
Australia Post Property VOI Team
